title: Swap on Uniswap Base
description: Complete your first swap on Uniswap's Base deployment. Join millions of users trading on the world's leading DEX.
verificationLogic: Check for Swap event emission from user address on Uniswap V3 Router

title: Create on BasePaint
description: Express your creativity on BasePaint. Contribute to the collaborative canvas and become part of Base's creative community.
verificationLogic: Check Transfer event from BasePaint contract to user address

title: Moonwell Governance: Start Delegating
description: Empower your voice in the Moonwell ecosystem by delegating your WELL tokens to yourself or a representative to enable voting power on Base.
actionRequired: Delegate WELL voting power to any address on Base mainnet
verificationLogic: Monitor the DelegateChanged(address,address,address) event on the WELL contract where the delegator matches the user address.

title: Swap on Uniswap Base
description: Complete your first swap on Uniswap's Base deployment. Join millions of users trading on the world's leading DEX.
verificationLogic: Check for Swap event emission from user address on Uniswap V3 Router

title: BasePaint: Artistic Initiation
description: Experience the pulse of Base art culture. Mint today's collaborative canvas to own a piece of history and join the community masterpiece.
actionRequired: Mint at least one BasePaint NFT for the current day's canvas.
verificationLogic: Detect the emission of a Transfer event from the 0x0 null address to the user's address on the target contract within the last 24 hours.

title: Zora Explorer: Mint Your First NFT
description: Start your digital collection on Base by minting an edition from any creator on the Zora protocol.
actionRequired: Complete a mint transaction on any Zora Creator 1155 contract on Base.
verificationLogic: Verify transaction to the Zora Mint Manager contract or check for TransferSingle events emitted by Zora Creator 1155 contracts to the user's wallet.

title: Create on BasePaint
description: Express your creativity on BasePaint. Contribute to the collaborative canvas and become part of Base's creative community.
verificationLogic: Check Transfer event from BasePaint contract to user address

title: Aerodrome Governance: Locking for veAERO
description: Contribute to the Base ecosystem by locking AERO tokens to receive veAERO, allowing you to vote on protocol emissions and governance proposals.
actionRequired: Lock at least 50 AERO tokens in the Aerodrome VotingEscrow contract.
verificationLogic: Verify the CreateLock event emitted by contract 0xeBf67A85299f9722c59637269394472432e14580 where the provider is the user address and the value is greater than or equal to 50e18.

title: Become a Moonwell Delegate
description: Strengthen the Moonwell ecosystem by delegating your WELL tokens. This action enables governance participation without spending your tokens.
actionRequired: Delegate WELL voting power to any address using the delegate function on the WELL contract.
verificationLogic: Verify the emission of the DelegateChanged event from the WELL contract address (0xA88594D27230022AF3C1eD3D9BaBA99E74f2E582) where the delegator matches the user address.

title: Canvas Creator: Mint on BasePaint
description: Join the collaborative art movement on Base by minting a daily open edition canvas from BasePaint.
actionRequired: Mint at least 1 NFT from the current daily canvas on BasePaint
verificationLogic: Verify the emission of a 'Transfer' event from the contract where 'from' is 0x0000000000000000000000000000000000000000 and 'to' is the user's address.

title: Friend.tech High-Stake Curator
description: Demonstrate your social conviction by acquiring high-value keys on the leading social protocol on Base.
actionRequired: Execute a single purchase of any subject's key with a value of 0.1 ETH or greater on Friend.tech.
verificationLogic: Listen for 'Trade' events on the FriendtechSharesV1 contract where the 'isBuy' boolean is true and the 'ethAmount' parameter is greater than or equal to 100,000,000,000,000,000 wei.

title: Moonwell Governance: Delegate Your WELL
description: Participate in the Moonwell ecosystem by delegating your WELL tokens. This process enables your voting power for future governance proposals on Base.
actionRequired: Call the delegate function on the WELL token contract to assign voting power to yourself or a representative.
verificationLogic: Check for DelegateChanged events emitted by contract 0xA88594D40d227F4544210f59b909c11900893720 where the delegator is the user address.

title: Aerodrome Liquidity Provision
description: Support the Base ecosystem's core liquidity. Provide $50 or more in liquidity to the WETH/USDC pool on Aerodrome and stake your LP tokens to earn protocol rewards.
actionRequired: Deposit at least $50 worth of liquidity into the vAMM-WETH/USDC pool and stake the LP tokens into the corresponding Gauge.
verificationLogic: Monitor the 'Deposit' event on the Gauge contract (0x16613524e02ad97eDfeF371bcC883F03826B664a) to verify the sender's staked balance exceeds the required threshold.

title: Masterpiece Collector: Mint on BasePaint
description: Participate in the world's largest collaborative art project on Base by minting an open edition canvas from the current daily painting.
actionRequired: Mint at least one daily canvas NFT from the BasePaint collection
verificationLogic: Verify Transfer event where from address is 0x0000000000000000000000000000000000000000 and the contract address is 0xBa5eBa5eBa5eBa5eBa5eBa5eBa5eBa5eBa5eBa5e

title: Moonwell Liquidity Provider
description: Supply assets to Moonwell, a leading decentralized lending protocol on Base, to earn yield and quest points.
actionRequired: Supply a minimum of 0.02 WETH to the Moonwell WETH market to provide liquidity to the protocol.
verificationLogic: Verify 'Mint' events on the mWETH contract (0x6283999eeC0640093ac599181C53927B33ad27ee) where the 'minter' address matches the user and 'mintAmount' is greater than or equal to 20000000000000000 (0.02 ETH).

title: Aerodrome Governance: Cast Your Vote
description: Participate in the decentralization of Base's largest liquidity protocol by locking AERO and voting on gauge weights.
actionRequired: Lock AERO tokens to receive a veAERO NFT and use it to cast a vote on any active gauge via the Voter contract.
verificationLogic: Verify the 'Voted' event on the Aerodrome Voter contract (0x16613524e02ad97eDdfFCA049d1284b75a3D3f05) filtered by the user's wallet address.
